Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in WWII Japan, covers the famine intensifying around him, and delves into his eventual decision to send himself on a dangerous adventure to stop his sister from continuing suffering.
